modName: My replacer for the Nightingale torso
summary:
This is my replacer of the Nightingale torso.
Standalone also available.
descriptionHtml:
Out there are many replacers for the Nightingale torso and this one's mine. It's a bit different from the others.
It's pretty much Nightingale armor mixed with Ebony mail armor.
It has the same enchantment and armor rating.
The meshes require a bit of fixing, I'll do that in the future and I'll also make the female version.

Standalone version is available.
It can be forged and tempered.
It's not enchanted.

NOTE: If you have any retextures of the nightingale armor and/or the ebony mail, it will change the texture on this armor.

INSTALLATION:
Unpack into the Data folder.
